price: Pa, ostavi Mene i one koji ovaj Govor poriču, Mi ćemo ih postepeno, odakle se i ne nadaju, patnji približavati
arabic: فَذَرۡنِي وَمَن يُكَذِّبُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِيثِۖ سَنَسۡتَدۡرِجُهُم مِّنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fadharnī waman yukadhibu bihādhā al-ḥadīthi sanastadrijuhum min ḥaythu lā yaʿlamūna
